data.description: Cereal flavored Ice Cream served in a cereal bowl. Topped with whipped cream and cherries.

data.description: Chocolate Fudge flavored Brownie. Served with ice cream of choice. Topped with Chocolate Fudge, whipped cream, and a cherry.

data.name: Banana Split Sundae
data.description: Banana Split Topped with whipped cream, cherries, and pecans.

data.name: Strawberry Sundae
data.description: Strawberry Ice Cream with strawberry sauce topped with whipped cream.

data.description: Fried Ice Cream flavored with fried bits. Topped with whipped cream and cherries.
